FermAT.SingleTrial module¶

class FermAT.SingleTrial.SingleTrial¶

Bases: object

Container for TiterObject to build a whole trial out of different measurements. E.g. one flask would contain data for biomass (OD), products (ethanol, acetate), substrates (glucose), fluorescence (gfpmut3, mCherry)

Attributes

products
stages
substrate_name
t

add_titer(titerObject)¶

Add a TiterObject

Parameters:

titerObject : TiterObject

A titer object to be added
calculate_ODE_fit()¶

WIP to fit the data to ODEs

calculate_mass_balance(OD_gdw=None, calculateFBACO2=False)¶

Calculate a mass balance given the supplied substrate and products

Parameters:

OD_gdw : float

The correlation betwen OD_gdw and OD600

calculateFBACO2 : bool

Flag to calculate the CO2 using FBA (not implemented yet)
calculate_specific_productivity()¶

Calculate the specific productivity (dP/dt) given \(dP/dt = k_{Product} * X\)

calculate_substrate_consumed()¶
calculate_yield(stage=None)¶
check_time_vectors_match()¶

Ensure that the time vectors match between AnalyteData objects. Functionality to deal with missing data or data with different sizes is not implemented.

create_stage(stage_bounds)¶
db_commit(replicateID, c=None, stat=None)¶

Commit object to database.

Parameters:

replicateID : int

replicateID to commit to

c : sql cursor

stat : str

If this is a statistic (avg, std), which statistic? None is used for raw data.
db_load(singleTrialID=None, c=None, stat=None)¶

Load object from database.

Parameters:

singleTrialID : int

The singleTrialID to laod

c : SQL cursor

stat : str

If this is a statistic (avg, std), which statistic? None is used for raw data.
